featured.text:
Hello, dear readers,

First off, we’re thankful for the adoption of open fleets and projects on balenaHub! Keep on trying new projects out and giving us helpful user feedback.

This month, hear the balena origin story from our Founder and check out the balenaSense v2 revamp of one of our most popular projects. On the IoT Happy Hour, learn more about Helium, and how to move your LoRaWAN gateways over to The Things Stack.

And, as always, check out some of the awesome community projects that we’ve found and see our open roles here at Team balena.

news.title: The balena origin story
news.text: Our founder and CEO, Alexandros Marionos, appeared as a guest on George Hristov’s podcast ‘Front Range Founders’, to talk about the story of Balena, Alex's operational philosophy, and his advice for young entrepreneurs.

news.title: A very Helium happy hour
news.text: Last month we invited the team from Helium to join us for our IoT Happy Hour to celebrate that there are more than 50.000 hotspots out there using Helium LoRaWAN network!

news.title: The new-and-improved balenaSense v2
news.text: Powered by balenaBlocks, get a closer look at the improved balenaSense v2 and how it removes the friction from setting up environmental sensors and tracking and collecting their data.

projects.title: Migrate your gateways with balena
projects.text: Do you need to migrate your LoRa gateways to The Things Stack? Check out this step by step video or download this project from community member Xose Perez that deploys The Things Stack LoRaWAN Network Server.

projects.title: How much wood can a woodchuck chuck?
projects.text: Check out this balena-powered, animatronic robot who co-hosts a Twitch stream learn to sing for the first time!

projects.title: Never be late again...
projects.text: Balena Ambassador Nico Maas has created this cool project for tapping into a precise time source and providing it to your local computer network via NTP.

jobs.text:
We’re looking for a number of roles for our growing team.

- Fleet Reliability Engineer
- Full Stack Engineer - Developer Tools
- Technical Sales Lead / Sales Engineer (Americas)
- Site Reliability Engineer (EMEA)
- Site Reliability Engineer (Americas)
- Site Reliability Engineer (EMEA)

Check them out, or if you think you could be a great fit for balena, design your own role and introduce yourself to us via open call. We’d love to get to know you better.

events.text:
We’re postponing our physical events to practice safe social distancing and keep our team safe and healthy. Instead, meet with us virtually during our weekly IoT Happy Hour!

Every Friday at 16:00 UTC, join our live stream to see IoT project builds, discuss hardware and software, talk shop, answer community questions, and more. Join our next session where the balena team will show you how to build a custom balenaOS image from source for a single board computer which doesn’t currently have balena support. Click to watch live with us on Friday at 16:00 UTC!
